introduction.title: Bryann Torres
introduction.subtitle: Full stack developer
introduction.aboutMe: Hello! I'm Bryann Torres, a Full Stack Developer with a year's experience in the tech industry. My expertise spans technologies such as React, Django, TypeScript, Python, Postgres, and JavaScript. In my current role, I've been successfully maintaining and developing web applications, addressing client needs and sharing knowledge with my team.

work.title: Work experience
work.experience: I have worked both for a software development company and also on personal projects, which have allowed me to learn and improve my skills as a developer. Below are some of the personal projects I have worked on:
work.myWork: As a full stack developer, my work primarily involves using React TypeScript and Django. I value teamwork, readily share knowledge with my colleagues, and consistently learn new things to enhance my skills.

worksList.iComm: As a full stack software developer, I have been working on the development and maintenance of web applications using React with TypeScript and Django as the main stack.

projectsList.discordBot: This is a personal project of a Discord bot still under development, which will include a card game that can be played in the chat.
projectsList.constellations: This is a personal project of a web application that allows you to see the constellations of the zodiac and their characteristics with a 3D view of the sky.

about.title: About me
about.myDescription: I'm a passionate developer constantly learning to refine my skills and share knowledge with others.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: More detailed information about how to contact me
